history.text: I like despicable me
I think it's ok. It looks like it got a much better rating than what I would have given it.
I feel like it is a good movie for children. It is quite informational and brings sweet and amusing entertainment.
I did not know that Jason Segal was one of the voice actors in that movie.
I agree, I think one of the best parts is that even though it is children friendly, adults can enjoy it just as much
I don't really remember where I have seen jason segal from
I kinda liked the song that pharrell did. Was it the song Happy?
Pixar seems to be very good at doing that. Jason Segal has played in a couple of different things, I remember him from Freaks and Geeks when he was younger and then he was also in I Love You, Man
Yes! I liked that song as well
The movie seemed to make it really popular
I remember that song blasted on the radio non stop!
I think it's funny that the minion craze is still a think
thing*
I know they made a Despicable Me 2, but the minions really took off haha
Was despicable me 2 about the purple minions?
I'm not sure! I haven't see that one to be honest
Haha yea I don't remember much about it
I thought it was quite weird when gru was able to shrink the moon.
It was interesting but also the physics on that is quite off.
Haha yeah totally, I think that's the point of animation though. To be able to make those kinds of things a reality. I really liked how this animation kind of show cased a villain
I think its kind of funny how Gru warms up to the girls
I love how the girls change Gru into such a warm character
It shows that Gru has a good side to him even though he still kinda wants to be bad
I know I totally agree. I think its kind of interesting as well, because even though he was the villain throughout the entire movie, he was still a likeable character.
I think adding the aspect of the little girls into the movie really kind of solidified his character
I agree and I also loved their acting
I think miranda cosgrove played one of the girls?
Oh really? I had no idea!
I thought it was pretty cool that the moon grew after they shrunk it
What did you think of the ending?
I really liked it.
I thought the ending was quite sweet
Now I want to watch some highlights. Maybe I'll watch it again soon haha
haha yea its worth watching again.
I think they made 2 more after this one right?
I know they for sure did a Despicable Me 2, but I would not be surprised if they did another after that
It was very popular
It was quite popular but i dont really like how people always want to stretch out the movies
well it was great talking to you!
